mapper.sql: SELECT review_no, U.user_no, user_nick , review_title, review_date, review_hit FROM zreview R LEFT OUTER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no(+) = R.user_no
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, R.* FROM ( SELECT review_no, U.user_no, user_nick, F.file_no, F.file_stored , i.item_no, i.item_brand, i.item_name, i.item_price , review_title, review_content, review_date, review_hit , ( SELECT count (review_com_no) FROM ZREVIEW_COMMENT WHERE review_no = 1 ) review_com_count FROM zreview R LEFT OUTER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no = R.user_no LEFT OUTER JOIN zfile F ON R.file_no = F.file_no LEFT OUTER JOIN zitem I ON R.item_no = I.item_no ORDER BY review_no ) R ) ZREVIEW WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo }
SELECT file_no, file_origin, file_stored, file_size, file_date FROM zfile WHERE file_no = #{fileNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZFILE ( file_no, file_origin, file_stored, file_size, file_date ) VALUES ( #{fileNo }, #{fileOrigin }, #{fileStored }, #{fileSize }, sysdate )
INSERT INTO ZITEM ( item_no, user_no, file_no, item_brand, item_name, item_price ) VALUES ( #{itemNo }, #{userNo }, #{fileNo }, #{itemBrand }, #{itemName }, #{itemPrice } )

INSERT INTO ZREVIEW ( review_no, item_no, user_no, file_no, review_title, review_content, review_date, review_hit ) VALUES ( zreview_seq.nextval, #{itemNo }, #{userNo }, #{fileNo }, #{reviewTitle }, #{reviewContent }, sysdate, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT review_no, r.file_no, file_origin, file_stored, file_size, file_date FROM ZFILE WHERE file_no = #{fileNo }
SELECT review_no, item_no, user_no, file_no , review_title, review_content, review_date, review_hit FROM ZREVIEW WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo }
